title: Humphrey Wants to Nap: BEDTIME Version
itunes:author: Rhea Pechter
itunes:summary:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting [THIS LINK](https://amzn.to/3RRovO5). I hope you LOVE IT!
This is the same Humphrey Wants To Nap you know and love, with quieter intro and exit music and no commentary before and after the story. Enjoy!
Make sure to subscribe to the podcast so you don't miss upcoming NEW stories in Season 2. Leave a review on iTunes to help more parents discover the podcast!
Visit www.littlestoriestinypeople.com and find us on Facebook/Twitter!

content:encoded:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting THIS LINK. I hope you LOVE IT!

This is the same Humphrey Wants To Nap you know and love, with quieter intro and exit music and no commentary before and after the story. Enjoy!

Make sure to subscribe to the podcast so you don't miss upcoming NEW stories in Season 2. Leave a review on iTunes to help more parents discover the podcast!

Visit www.littlestoriestinypeople.com and find us on Facebook/Twitter!
